# Government Tender Announcement

## Standing Offer - Quality Assurance and Material Testing

### New Brunswick Region

#### Request for Proposal

**Reference Number**: PWPWJ-004-6253
**Solicitation Number**: EC015-230660/A
**Publication Date**: September 6, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: October 11, 2022, at 13:00:00 (Local Time)

**Description**
Public Works and Government Services Canada seeks to establish a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Quality Assurance and Material Testing services in New Brunswick. The RISO will include the testing and inspection of concrete, asphaltic concrete, soils, granular fill, compaction, and mortar materials, including Heritage Mortar.

The period of the Standing Offer will be for two years with two option years from the date of award and will be on an "as and when required" basis. A standing offer is an agreement and not a contract, and there is no guarantee that the full or any amount of the standing offer will be called-up.

**Requirements**

* Testing and inspection of concrete, asphaltic concrete, soils, granular fill, compaction, and mortar materials, including Heritage Mortar
* Inspection of reinforcing bar layout for various projects located throughout New Brunswick Counties

**Contract Period**
The period of the Standing Offer will be for two years with two option years from the date of award.

**Selection Criteria**
The lowest priced bid will be used to evaluate bids, subject to compliance with the terms and conditions outlined in the bid solicitation.

**Procedure for Bids**

* Bids will be accepted electronically through the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS)
* All bidders are required to obtain the bid documents through GETS
* Bids must be received by the tender closing date and time specified above

**Inquiries**

* All technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contractual Authority:

	+ Telephone: (506) 343-6382
	+ Fax: (506) 851-6759
	+ Email: edward.johnston@pwgsc.gc.ca
